original_title: Pédophiles en Asie, la fin de l'impunité?
overview: A 90 min documentary by director Paul Moreira. In certain countries of Southeast Asia, where the state is failing, citizens mobilize to replace public forcein order to combat crime. In Cambodia, an association made up of Westerners and Khmers, fights pedophilia differently. It mobilizes around fifty investigators who act as police inspectors.
title: Pedophiles in Asia: The End of Impunity?
